reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
reviews.text: I booked a room here knowing I had a late flight into Kansas City and I wanted someplace close to the airport to stay. Compared to other properties in the area the price was extremely reasonable.

When I arrived I was immediately welcomed by the front desk staff. My room was comfortable and clean. This wasn't a luxury property by any stretch, but the room had all of the features I would expect at a Best
reviews.title: Park and Fly a disappointment
